skillTree.name: Tuskgor Chariot
skillTree.description: Pugnacious and stubborn, the war beasts that pull these ramshackle chariots are grotesque combinations of great boar and mighty ram.

skillTree.name: Razorgor Chariot
skillTree.description: Those strong enough to tame the powerful, unruly Razorgors can harness them for chariots.

skillTree.name: Uncanny Senses
skillTree.description: He knows. Nobody knows how, but he does. He has always just known.

skillTree.name: Shadow Hide
skillTree.description: Chaos smiles upon them, granting unnatural and heretical defence against mortal machinations.

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say noâ€¦

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: Devolve
skillTree.description: The Bray-Shaman magnifies the savage and animalistic parts of the foe's psyche until they are no more than growling beasts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Devolve Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Bestial Surge
skillTree.description: The Bray-Shaman inflames the uncontrollable urge to rend the foe limb from limb, causing the roaring, bellowing mass to surge forward.

skillTree.name: Bray-Scream
skillTree.description: This spell unleashes a howling roar of such intensity that it mashes brains and bursts eyeballs.

ui_effects.description: âž• Short, wide, expanding, tear-shaped attack
âž– Weak vs a single combatant

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Bray-Scream Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Viletide
skillTree.description: A vile wave indeed, the creeping things that nest in the decaying undergrowth swarm all over the foe.

ui_effects.description: âž• Strong vs a single unit
âž• Strong vs a single unit
âž• Strong vs a single unit

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Viletide Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Traitor-Kin
skillTree.description: A red-hot spear of wrath is driven into enemy mounts' wild hearts, causing them to turn upon their riders.

ui_effects.description: âž• Strong vs a single combatant
âž– Chance opponent will resist damage

skillTree.name: Mantle of Ghorok
skillTree.description: Ghorok was a legendary Minotaur, ferocious as a storm. His spirit-mantle is terrible and dangerous to the bearer.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Mantle of Ghorok Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Mantle of Ghorok"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Mantle of Ghorok Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Savage Dominion
skillTree.description: The Bray-Shaman sends his mind into the wilds, possessing the largest creature he can find and storming back with a vengeance.

ui_effects.description: âž– Summoned units degrade over time
âž– Summoned units degrade over time

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -5 for "Savage Dominion"

skillTree.name: Earthing
skillTree.description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.

skillTree.name: Magical Reserves
skillTree.description: A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

skillTree.name: Viletide [HIDDEN]
skillTree.description: This spell calls to the creeping things of the undergrowth, sending a swarm of spiders, centipedes and slug-beetles onto the foe.

skillTree.name: Scouting
skillTree.description: Spellcasters can oft-sense when magic is close or being drawn from the Winds.

effects.description: Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 5%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 10%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.name: Spread Corruption
skillTree.description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description: Spread Corruption action: Chaos corruption is increased by an additional 1
Spread Corruption action: Chaos corruption is increased by an additional 2
Spread Corruption action: Chaos corruption is increased by an additional 3

skillTree.name: Steal Technology
skillTree.description: Oft-times, though you may have much, what you want the most is what your rivals have; such envy focuses the mind and creativity.

effects.description: Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 3%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 6%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 10%

skillTree.name: Wound
skillTree.description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 4% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 10% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 18% chance of wounding target

skillTree.name: Block Army
skillTree.description: To sow discord and confuse the enemy, sending them down the wrong route or befuddling their senses.

effects.description: Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -3%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -8%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -15%

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

skillTree.name: Booze Cravings
skillTree.description: Some beings just don't know when to put the bottle down.

skillTree.name: Khorne's Fury
skillTree.description: More than mere bloodlust, this one is filled with the primal, Ruinous rage of the Lord of Battle.

skillTree.name: Nurgle's Foul Stink
skillTree.description: This one has something of the compost heap about themâ€¦

skillTree.name: Unsated Bloodthirst
skillTree.description: Sometimes, letting so much blood that the soil itself is stained just isn't enough. And it will never be.

skillTree.name: Cunning
skillTree.description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

skillTree.name: Determined
skillTree.description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

skillTree.name: Confident
skillTree.description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

skillTree.name: Disciplined
skillTree.description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.

skillTree.name: Perceptive
skillTree.description: Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

skillTree.name: Aggressive
skillTree.description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.

skillTree.name: Tough
skillTree.description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.

skillTree.name: Knowledgeable
skillTree.description: What this being doesn't know probably isn't worth knowing, so deep is their interest in the world and its ways.

effects.description: Enemy Winds of Magic power reserve: -5

skillTree.name: Intelligent
skillTree.description: Sharp minds make sharp blades sharper still.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +5% chance of wounding aggressors
